doc.field: Tl'aan nidhihshyah ts'ą̈' nah'än niits'etdek danh shyah utüh tagntth'äł
Tl'aan nidhihshyah ts'ą̈' nah'än niits'etdek danh shyah utüh tagntth'äł
And I get up on the way to the outhouse I will fall over it.
